title: Lily Allen calls new boyfriend Stranger Things' David Harbour 'mine'
text:
The pair recently confirmed their new relationship (Picture: lilyallen)

Lily Allen has called David Harbour ‘mine’ after the sweet pair confirmed their relationship, hinting that the they’ve made things exclusive.

We’re already sold on this romance.

The unlikely pair, who were spotted packing on the PDA during a stroll in New York City as they kissed and cuddled in the street, appear to be getting serious.

Capturing her beau during his stand-up set for Saturday Night Live, Lily posted a snap to Instagram, captioning it ‘Mine.’

So sweet!

David’s parents also headed along to support the star at the show, which saw him star in a Joker-style skit about a film adaptation of Sesame’s Streets Oscar the Grouch.

Also taking to Instagram, Lily has revealed she’ll be leaving the UK until after Brexit, with fans speculating that she’ll be staying with her new man.

Lily supported her beau at his SNL set (Picture: lilyallen)

Rumours about the pair first started circulating back in August when they were spotted leaving a London theatre together.

Advertisement

Advertisement

The couple were then seen as they enjoyed a date night to the Hughie Fury vs Alexander Povetkin boxing match at the O2 Arena.

Lily, who has two daughters from her marriage to Sam Cooper, had been single since splitting from boyfriend of three years Meridian Dan.

Speaking in January on Elizabeth Day’s How To Fail podcast, the Sheezus singer said: ‘I’ve always had a boyfriend. I don’t at the moment.

‘I’m single for the first time since I was about 15.

‘It’s just been bad news after bad news after bad news and I think that fact that I haven’t called him and been like, “Hey, wanna come around for a cuddle?” means that it’s big for me, because ordinarily, when things get difficult, I do need to have somebody around to share those problems.

‘So the fact that I’m dealing with it all on my own, I’m growing up.’
